name: Automated employee payments with data grabbed from a time-tracking app
description:
Retrieve the time tracked by your employees on Harvest, store all the details in Google Sheets and create draft payments using Revolut Business.

The setup of the template assumes you have your employee data stored in a Google Sheets sheet. It has to include these columns: Name of the employee and payment details. 

To see which details are required to create a Revolut draft payment depending on the country, click [here](https://developer.revolut.com/docs/build-banking-apps/#tutorials-tutorials-work-with-draft-payments-international-payments). For example, if you're creating a payment to the United Kingdom, your Sheet #2 (the one with the courier information) needs to include an Account Number and a Sort Code; for payment to Germany, it's IBAN and BIC.
